Posts.Content: Diagnosed on Wednesday.  Seeing consultant next week or put a plan in place.  Am scared stiff.
Posts.Title: Hello, I'm new here.

Posts.Content: Thank you for your lovely post Linda.  One minute I feel fine and positive, the next I don't.  I don't really know how to feel right now.
Posts.Title: Hello, I'm new here.

Posts.Content: Ah Gemma, you poor thing you're so young.  I'm a lot older than you (52) and there's been so much breast cancer in my family I can hardly say it's a surprise.   If I didn't have my family I think I'd be lost.   My son and daughter are in their early teens so this is tough for them too.  Not sure my husband has really taken it in yet.  I'm glad you've got support around you too, it's so important isn't it.  Xxx
Posts.Title: Hello, I'm new here.
